NoticeData.Contents: ## Patrol Reward Event Feb 24, 2026 – Mar 24, 2026 (4 weeks) During the event period, Patrol Rewards will be adjusted so that players can obtain Golden Dust, Ruby Dust, or Emerald Dust based on their level range, with up to 2,000+ obtainable. Log in and claim rewards regularly to experience a variety of summons! ## Transcendent-Grade Summon Equipment Added ▸ 4 New Auras - Transcendent Auras: Ymir, Beast, Aegis, Barrage ▸ 9 New Grimoires - 3 each in Attack / Defense / Function categories (Total 9) ▸ 2 New Runes - Limited-time planet Thor-related Transcendent Runes - Skill Rune: Thor’s Mjölnir Rune - Stat Rune: Ragnarok Rune ▸ 2 New Costumes - Championship commemorative Transcendent costumes: - Odin 26 First Champion - Heimdall 26 First Champion ## Transcendent-Grade Adjustments - Summon Rate Changes - Aura / Grimoire / Rune / Costume summon data updated - Synthesis Changes - Aura / Grimoire / Costume synthesis data updated - Mythic costumes SharkBa2 and TriplexMazi can no longer be obtained via synthesis ## Game Improvements - Added new Collections related to Transcendent equipment - Added Mythic-grade Hammer

## Game Improvements - Event Dungeon SWEEP Added - You can now quickly claim rewards from event dungeons by using SWEEP based on the number of tickets you own. - Increased Stage SWEEP Max AP Potion Usage - Previous: Max 20 - Updated: Max 100 potions - Increased Stage REPEAT Max AP Potion Usage - Previous: Max 1 - Updated: Max 5 potions - Reduced World Boss Repeat Block Interval - Previous: Once every 5 blocks - Updated: Once every 1 block - At the beginning of the update, the interval was set to ensure a similar experience across all environments due to the lack of animation skip. With this change, faster progression is now possible. - Rune Level Cap Adjustment on Initial Unlock - Previously, newly unlocked runes were limited to emphasizing the “open” feature rather than upgrading. - This has been adjusted so that newly unlocked runes can now be leveled up to Level 30, depending on available materials, allowing faster progression. - Collection Sorting Improvements - Previous: Displayed in descending order based on the time added - Updated: Collections are now grouped by % reward priority, then sorted by total reward value in descending order - 21 New Collections Added ## Infinite Tower Season 3 Data Added - Added content for Infinite Tower Season 3, which will run throughout February - Skill Runes and Auras disabled - Increased the number of conditions applied per floor to provide a more varied experience - Maximum CP significantly increased - Chains with 5 or more players reaching Floor 100 this season will unlock additional floors in the next season, so we encourage your participation ## 2nd Anniversary Event Ended - 2nd Anniversary Event Popup Closed - Patrol rewards have been restored to their original state - Thor Event Conclusion - After the currently ongoing World Boss, no further content such as Arena, World Boss, or Infinite Tower is scheduled for Thor. - The period opened to allow players to return staked assets and held NCG to their original chains during February will be closed, so please plan accordingly to avoid any inconvenience. Bug Fixes - Fixed an issue where season rewards could not be properly claimed when the Fenrir-type World Boss was active.

## Infinite Tower 2nd season - This season, Aura and Water/Wind attribute equipment cannot be used on any floor. - Starting this season, the probability of each condition being selected will be displayed. - Starting this season, the conditions selected for each floor will be shown when you enter the floor. - The resources required to enter each floor have also been simplified. - From next year, we are considering a system where seasonal conditions for the Tower of Infinity will be proposed by the community. We look forward to your ideas and participation. ## 25 Last Event Dungeon - Golden Dust Valut Open - A year-end seasonal event dungeon where you can obtain Golden Dust and Sapphire Dust has been added. ## NCU 2nd Project – Teaser Banner Update - A new NCU project is on the way — one that both new players on a new platform and long-time Nine Chronicles fans will be able to enjoy together. - In this project, you’ll play through content tied to Nine Chronicles’ main story, *Odin’s Conspiracy*. We’re also working hard on features that let you make payments with WNCG in external environments. - In addition, we’re carefully reviewing many of the high-quality projects from the recent game jam to see if they can be integrated into NCU. We’d really appreciate your interest and support. ## Game Improvements - A red dot indicator is now shown on the 2nd Anniversary event popup when Recon rewards are available to claim.
